==== Examples ==== 

===== Bounce multi-colored =====
<source> 
{{ #widget : PieChart
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Te.*Ltd$") }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
  | colors = {{ '#07BF41' | '#1E8099' | '#F7D709' | '#59DEE0' | '#F97D2A' | '#F265F2' | '#69EF74' }}
  | startEffect = 'bounce'
}}
</source>

<img src="../images/help/PieChart/BounceMulti-colored.PNG" width="800px" />

===== Simple =====

<source>
{{ #widget : PieChart
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Te.*Ltd$") }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
  | startEffect = '>'
}}
